creator: craig_bogovich@hphc.org
text:
I apologize if I am using this forum inappropriately.  We are new to Apache and seeing the following error from time to time in our application:

Bad Gateway
The proxy server received an invalid response from an upstream server.

The error seems to correspond to the following messages found in the apache error logs:

[error] (111)Connection refused: proxy: HTTP.

Where can I find more information on error# 111?

creator: covener@gmail.com
text:
It comes from your os, the manual for the connect subroutine is probably the place to go. 

Since this bugzilla is for suspected defects in Apache HTTP Server, for further help, try the Apache HTTP Server users discussion list: 

http://httpd.apache.org/userslist.html
Hi,Why did you say id comes from your os? I reboot the os, then the error appeared.
creator: wuxiong@huawei.com
wuxiong@huawei.com
text: Hi,Why did you say id comes from your os? I reboot the os, then the error appeared.
